parameters: \N<Segi>Riia, are you okay staying up...?

\N<Riia>...Yeah, I'm fine thanks to the medicine mom gave me. I'm
okay for now...?
\N<Segi>I see... That's good...

\N<Riia>Also... you know, I can't sleep. I was scared. I had a scary
dream... A dream where... mom goes away somewhere...
\N<Segi>...
\N<Riia>So... I thought maybe mom wouldn't come back this time...

\N<Segi>That won't happen, I promise. Mom will definitely come back
to Riia.
\N<Riia>Mom...

\N<Segi>Watch me fight until the very end, okay? If you're here...
mom can keep going.
\N<Segi>...?
\N<Rame>Miss Segi... it's me.
\N<Rame>...Hello. Is Riia-chan... asleep?
\N<Segi>Rame-chan...

\N<Rame>Miss Segi, you have some important business, right? If so...
it's okay here, please go ahead.

\N<Rame>When Riia-chan wakes up... I'll be by his side. That's all I
can do...
\N<Segi>Understood... then I'll leave it to you.
\N<Rame>Yes, please leave Riia-chan to me.
\N<Riia>Rame... chan...
\N<Rame>Riia-chan... good morning, how are you feeling?

\N<Riia>Yeah... probably... I think I'm okay. More importantly...
what are you doing here...?

\N<Rame>I'm here to visit you, Riia-chan. Ah, Miss Segi asked me to,
so I had no choice... you know?
\N<Riia>I see...

\N<Rame>Riia-chan... you've been through a lot. I've heard most of
what happened from Miss Segi?
\N<Riia>...
\N<Rame>Oh, um! It's weird to say this now but...! You see... me!?

\N<Rame>To-today... from now on... I have a very important matter to
attend to... and so...
\N<Riia>An important matter...?
\N<Rame>Ye-yeah... with my mother and the soldiers of Lyuda...

\N<Rame>Maybe after that matter is over... I might not be able to
see Riia-chan anymore... so that's why...
\N<Rame>That's why... you know? Before that happens...

\N<Fubii>Hey, don't mind me interrupting? Also, the door was left
unlocked, pretty careless.
\N<Rame>Fubii...
\N<Riia>...What do you want? Why are you here...?

\N<Fubii>Just visiting. Both of you haven't been coming to the
training grounds lately, so I was worried. From the looks of
it, it doesn't seem too serious, does it?
\N<Riia>...

\N<Fubii>Lucky you, having a girl by your side. You can always get
comforted when times are tough. Using that body of yours,
right? Huh?
\N<Rame>...
\N<Riia>...What kind of visit is that. It's a lie, so blatant...

\N<Riia>But... it's just as well. Rame-chan, I have something to
talk about with Fubii alone.
\N<Fubii>Huh...?
\N<Rame>Understood... Then, I'll be outside, okay?
\N<Rame>...

\N<Fubii>Ahaha, don't worry, I won't lay a hand on you anymore. At
least not me or my guys. That old man Rozaro gave us a real
talking-to.

\N<Fubii>Well, even if we can't do it again, we're all grateful for
graduating from virginity thanks to you, right? Ahaha.
\N<Rame>...

\N<Fubii>Oh, right. Isn't that old man kind of scary? You never know
what he might do, that type is unpredictable.

\N<Fubii>Well, it's none of my business, but you better watch out,
okay?
A
\N<Segi>...
\N<Segi>...Mmm...
\N<Segi>...Where is this...
\N<Irime>Segi, are you awake?
\N<Segi>Irime-san...

\N<Irime>You gave me quite a scare. Suddenly, Lyuda's soldiers came
to our place and said to go to the administration office.
Then I found you completely exhausted...

\N<Segi>I see... I must have passed out... I'm sorry, Irime-san.
I've caused you worry...

\N<Irime>It's okay... There's no need to get used to such things.
Still... as long as you're safe, that's all that matters.
\N<Segi>What about Zuuteruka...?

\N<Irime>Ah, he said he wants you to come to the administration
office once you've woken up.

\N<Segi>...? Speaking of which, where's Riia? Do you know where Riia
is?

\N<Irime>That's the thing... I don't know. He's been out of sight
since I brought you here. He's more reliable than he looks,
so I don't think there's a need to worry, but...
\N<Segi>...
\N<Segi>Riia... Where did you go?

\N<Segi>...Staying here won't do any good. I should head to the
administration office.
clo1
\C[1]Information\C[0]

The preparation status for the Training Corps has been
updated. Let's open the notebook.
A
DW_ Head_to_the_management_office.
OriginMenuStatus SetParam param3 Normal
A

\N<Segi>Is that so... I'm glad you were able to have a proper
conversation.

\N<Irime>Hehe, I owe it all to you, thank you. I'm really grateful to
you. I'll definitely return the favor someday, okay?

\N<Segi>Please stop, I haven't done anything. More than that, I'd be
happy if we could just continue to be friends as before.

\N<Irime>I see. If that's what you say, then I'll gratefully accept.
Please continue to look after me, okay?
\N<Segi>...Yes.
\N<Irime>By the way... how is Riia doing?
\N<Segi>Well... to be honest, for better or for worse...

\N<Segi>But if we leave things as they are, his body will definitely
continue to weaken. And eventually...
\N<Irime>...

\N<Irime>Isn't there... anything we can do? I'll help with whatever I
can, okay?
\N<Segi>The thing is...
\N<Ryuda Soldier>Open up, I am a messenger from the management office.
\N<Segi>Eh...?

\N<Ryuda Soldier>I am a messenger from the management office. All able
residents must hurry to the central plaza. Lord Zuuteruka
has an important message for you all.
\N<Segi>An important message...?

\N<Irime>What on earth are you talking about, out of the blue! The
silly training assembly is over, isn't it!?

\N<Ryuda Soldier>Details will be provided when everyone gathers, as Lord
Zuuteruka will explain. I repeat, proceed quietly to the
central plaza.
\N<Segi>...
B
\N<Fubii>So? What's so important that you wanted to talk to me alone?
\N<Riia>...

\N<Fubii>Is it about dear Rame-chan? If that's the case, it's already
too late, haha.
\N<Riia>...That's part of it, but not all.
\N<Fubii>Hehe... then it's about her, isn't it? About your aunt?
\N<Riia>If you know, then good... What's this all about?

\N<Fubii>Sigh... this topic again. Haven't I told you before? Your
mother and I are lovers.
\N<Riia>That can't be true...

\N<Fubii>Why can't it be? Your aunt is a woman too. It's totally
possible for her to fall for me.
\N<Riia>...

\N<Fubii>Okay, then come and see for yourself. If you can't believe
it, I'll show you. Don't you think it'll clear things up for
both of us? I'm tired of repeating the same story too.
\N<Riia>...

\N<Fubii>Tomorrow, your aunt is coming to my place. I'll give you a
front-row seat to watch. Don't worry, just hide somewhere
around and you won't be noticed.
\N<Riia>...

\N<Fubii>What's with the silence? Not confident? If you can't believe
it, you have no choice but to see with your own eyes.
\N<Segi>Riia, are you okay staying up...?

\N<Riia>...Yeah, I'm fine thanks to the medicine mom gave me. I'm
okay for now...?
\N<Segi>I see... that's good...

\N<Riia>Also... you know, I can't sleep. I was scared. I had a scary
dream... A dream where mom goes away somewhere...
\N<Segi>...
\N<Riia>So... I thought maybe mom wouldn't come back this time...

\N<Segi>That won't happen, I promise. Mom will definitely come back
to Riia.
\N<Riia>Mom...

\N<Segi>Watch me fight until the very end, okay? If you're here...
mom can keep going.
\N<Segi>...?
\N<Rame>Segi-san... it's me.
\N<Rame>...Hello. Is Riia-chan... asleep now?
\N<Segi>Rame-chan...

\N<Rame>Segi-san, you have some important business, right? If so...
it's okay here, please go ahead.

\N<Rame>When Riia-chan wakes up... I'll be by his side. He might not
want to see my face though...
\N<Rame>But, probably... this is my responsibility.
\N<Segi>Did something happen with Riia?

\N<Rame>...I hurt Riia-chan because of me. So please let me stay
here... I want to be here.

\N<Rame>It's surely a selfish way of atoning, but... it's all I can
do.
\N<Segi>Rame-chan...
\N<Segi>Understood... then I'll leave it to you.
\N<Rame>Yes, when he wakes up... whatever he says, I'll accept it.

\N<Segi>Hey, Rame-chan, can I say one thing? I don't know what
happened, but Riia won't blame you.

\N<Segi>He's not that kind of child... I'm sure you can make up. I
didn't raise him to make girls cry.
\N<Rame>Segi-san...
\N<Fubii>Hey, am I interrupting?
\N<Rame>Fubii...
\N<Riia>...What do you want? Why are you here...?

\N<Fubii>Just paying a visit. You two haven't been coming to the
training grounds lately, so I was worried. Looks like it's
not too serious then?
\N<Riia>...

\N<Fubii>Lucky you, having a girl by your side. She can comfort you
anytime when it's tough. Using that body of hers, right?
Huh?
\N<Rame>...
\N<Riia>...What kind of visit is this. It's a lie, so blatant...

\N<Riia>But... it's just as well. Rame-chan, I have something to
discuss with Fubii alone.
\N<Fubii>Huh...?
\N<Rame>Understood... then I'll go outside, okay?
\N<Rame>...

\N<Fubii>Ahaha, don't worry so much, I won't lay a hand on you
anymore. At least not me and my guys. That old man Rozaro
gave us quite the scolding.

\N<Fubii>Well, even if we can't do it again, we should be thankful
for letting us graduate from being virgins, right? Ahaha.
\N<Rame>...

\N<Fubii>Ah, that's right. Isn't that old man a bit scary? You never
know what he might do, that type is unpredictable.

\N<Fubii>Well, it's none of my business, but you better be careful,
okay?
A
